statement.p: Janice is conducting market research on the cost of a private helicopter tour. Janice has determined that the average cost of a private helicopter tour is 650, and that the distribution of costs is normally distributed with a standard deviation of 96.
a. Find the probability that a single randomly selected consumer spends less than 550 on a private helicopter tour.
b. The cost of the middle 50 of private helicopter tours falls between (round to the nearest dollar):
c. The most expensive 14 of private helicopter tours cost at least how much? (round to the nearest dollar)
